      • parseFileList

        public java.util.List<VersionedFile> parseFileList(java.io.File[] fileList,
                                                   java.lang.String namespace,
                                                   boolean allVersions,
                                                   FileType fileType,
                                                   boolean recursively)
        Parses Java array of Files into list List
        Parameters:
        fileList - to parse
        namespace - directory path
        allVersions - hether to return all or only the latest versions
        fileType - whether to filter by file type, null means no filtering
        recursively - whether to parse folders recursively
        Returns:
        list of versioned files

                                                        FileType fileTypeFilter)
        Parses file list received from List command of BaseX into list of PathVersionPair
        Parameters:
        fileList - list of files to parse
        namespace - namespace of these files
        allVersions - whether to return all or only the latest versions
        fileTypeFilter - whether to filter by file type, null means no filtering
        Returns:
        list of PathVersionPair
